title: NEED FONT INDENTIFICATION
content:
Hi all.

I am after this font in the image supplied.

I know it’s a really popular font and so hopfully someone can help me out. I will need to download it if its freeware or purchase it if it is’nt.

Regards.

comments.content: ITC Avant Garde Gothic with alternates (again).
